page.title: 13TRADE
page.content: Crowborough and Rotherfield are quite well supplied with shops.Rotherfield has 17 which cover the needs of the village.Some, like the Chemists have been trading since the end of the 19th century.Jarvis Brook has a varied selection of small shops.On the way to Rotherfield is a Garden Centre which sells pond life, plants and flowers. Poisonous insecticides are also sold but a special licence is needed . They buy their plants from nurseries in York or as far away as Holland. The Crowborough Chamber of Trade have en_ couraged the opening of a new shopping precinct and shopping arcade in the centre of Crowborough.However, in spite of a fairly wide variety of shops and goods available, people need to travel further afield to Brighton, Eastbourne & Tunbridge Wells to purchase larger items like furniture.
